channel.title: Comments on: The “ dark ” passages of the Bible
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: avrahambronstein
item.dc:creator: avrahambronstein
item.description: Interesting that he is working towards "correct interpretation of these passages." When people ask me about them, I usually make the point more about the meaning of centuries of commentary that take it for granted that we, on some level or another, simply don't accept (genocide against Amalek | killing them Ben Sorer UMoreh | enforcing an Eye for an Eye | etc).
item.content:encoded: Interesting that he is working towards “correct interpretation of these passages.” When people ask me about them, I usually make the point more about the meaning of centuries of commentary that take it for granted that we, on some level or another, simply don’t accept (genocide against Amalek | killing them Ben Sorer UMoreh | enforcing an Eye for an Eye | etc).
